lender.name: Melanie
lender.occupation: Director of Volunteer Services, Humane Society
lender.loan_because: I want to give others hope and help to realize their self-worth.
lender.occupational_info: Just like my reason to lend, my work allows me to give people the opportunity to volunteer and to make a difference in their lives and the lives of homeless animals, thereby realizing their self-worth.

lender.name: The Moyes Family
lender.loan_because: We need to take care of one another.
lender.occupational_info: I work from a home office. My husband is a 6th grade school teacher. Our son works hard in school, earns money doing odd jobs, and is an amazing musician.

lender.name: Inger
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ryan A
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide others with an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work to create a better understanding of population change in small, rural U.S. communities in hopes of being able to provide those communities with resources to remain vibrant.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: Im fortunate I am able to do this...

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I missed a chance to be in the Peace Corp when I was young. Now I can do something good without leaving home. Kiva.org is fun because I can hope to visit these countries some day.
lender.occupational_info: Most of my life I have worked to construct buildings and later to inspect homes and commercial buildings to make sure they are safe. More recently I worked to make sure new buildings are in places that are safe from floods, landslides, and natural hazards.

lender.name: Golnaz
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a better life & no one deserves to live in poverty.

lender.name: zannie
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to need money and have no where to turn. People have been generous to me and helped me out when I needed it. I want to be able to do the same for others. I am happy to have the opportunity.

lender.name: Josh & Christa
lender.loan_because: God's love motivates us to love others, and to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: God has called us to encourage and equip this generation to love God and to love people!

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find ways to manage their emotions and mental health.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: While adopting my son from Viet Nam, I spent 3 weeks traveling around the country, and it became clear to me that: 1) a large proportion of the workforce were self-employed owners of busineses such as those funded by Kiva; and 2) small loans such as those made by Kiva could a make a significant difference for those wanting to begin or expand their businesses. I participate in this program because I wanted to do something meaningful, however small it is, to give something back to the amazing, generous people who gave me my son.

lender.name: G.VEGA
lender.loan_because: I think 100.00 in the hands of an individual is more powerful than 100 million dollars in the hands of a government.
lender.occupational_info: Iwork in hospital admonistration for the largest, busiest county hospital system in the united states, i see first hand the health effects of poverty and hopelesness.

lender.name: Rob&Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others!!

lender.name: Kelli Rhyanne
lender.loan_because: It's a good feeling knowing that I CAN make a difference in someone's life...no matter how large or small.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker with Keller Williams Realty Mid-Willamette, here in Corvallis, Oregon. It is such a great feeling knowing I have a part in helping people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Ayden & Ashlyn
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Helping others becomes successful helps us all.
lender.occupational_info: I work in health care -- surgery.

lender.name: philip
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with much....so that we may be a blessing to others.

lender.name: christina
lender.loan_because: i want to help!

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and feel this is a wonderful way to not only help others financially, but to spread a feeling of hope.
lender.occupational_info: My business partner and I produce and distribute Christian radio programs as well as business commercials and other audio & video products.

lender.name: The McCurry Family
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to support their family and make their dream happen!!
lender.occupational_info: Brian helps people borrow money to buy homes, land and expand their businesses.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: This is not a bandaid solution. These loans are giving people the little lift that they need to live a stainable life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get fit, live a healthy a life and have a good time doing it!

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra to share

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: The internet has made us one village.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: Boring

lender.name: Sarah Michelle
lender.loan_because: I, too, dream of being successful. Why not help? Why not care? I don't have much to offer, but I'll offer what I can. We should all invest in people, dreams, hope -- not in that pair of designer shoes, that extra scoop of ice cream, that $50 hair cut. We can all cut down and still get what we want while at the same time helping others get what they need. :)

lender.name: Scharma
lender.loan_because: As the recipient of many kind acts in my life, it's only fair to "pass it on."
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults who are trying to earn their high school degrees.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.occupational_info: I work in a office and do typing, filing, scheduling...

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Work with departments to review and revise existing courses as programs, as well as develop new materials where necessary.

lender.name: Johnny & Lizabeth
lender.loan_because: We loan because it makes ya feel good when you can help other people, help themselves. Ask & ye shall recieve says the Lord.
lender.occupational_info: We build things,stores,offices, banks,hotels.With the help of others.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: I really like the idea of making a big difference in someone's life. With Kiva I'm able to directly do just that. We all have the same hopes and dreams for our families and ourselves wherever we are in the world. I love the idea of a loan rather than a gift as the loan empowers and increases the self-worth of the individual. Thanks KIVA for a great ida.
lender.occupational_info: I have a vending business. I install machines into dentist and doctors offices and the children receive a token from the dentist to go to the machine and get a toy for themselves. The kids get so excited to go see the dentist now, image :D

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who want to work hard and build a better live for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I develop formulations and processes for the rubber industry.

lender.name: Fabs
lender.loan_because: i want to share my blessings!

lender.name: Randy & Abbey
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed in our own lives. We just want to do what we can to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Randy is a Firefighter and Paramedic who helps people in emergency situations. Firefighters/Paramedics save lives and property on a daily basis. Abbey helps people by releasing tension and creating equilibrium of mind, body and soul through massage and body work techniques.

lender.name: Prudence
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and raise my 5 kids.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity to learn about other people and other places in the world. Helping one person at a time can be done thanks to this terrific organization. I am honored to be involved with KIVA. Thanks and hello to all my fellow lenders!
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in getting the information that they need; when they need it. BOOKS RULE! (the internet is okay too)

lender.name: Marisa
lender.occupation: New business owner for a massage therapy

lender.name: Hal
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are willing to work to prosper.

lender.name: MEAGAN DUNTON
lender.loan_because: IT MAKES US FEEL GOOD TO HELP SOMEONE GET THAT JUMP START THEY NEED.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people less fortunate than myself. This is not charity...it gives me the ability to reuse my contribution over and over again to help as many people as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager in a large international Information Technology corporation.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I feel that I have been given the opportunity to make a difference. I have been blessed by many things and I feel I should share this to others.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in my life and I love helping people who need it. I thank God that I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired hairdresser. I loved my profession and was very successful in it. Working with people and making them feel good about themselves was awesome.After working 23 years I retired.

lender.name: JanischCrew
lender.loan_because: Although times are tough and money is tight, there is always someone who struggles even more.
lender.occupational_info: My husband builds homes and I am a part-time college student, work part-time and a Mommy.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and I want to make a difference in the world wherever I can.

lender.name: Gator Gang
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to fulfill a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Establishing new companies nationwide with the outlook of providing new jobs for individuals in the community.

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: New Media Sales and Marketing Director
lender.loan_because: I need all the good karma I can get.
lender.occupational_info: Crazy busy.

lender.name: Paul and Karin
lender.loan_because: I am a Business Owner, and this is my opportunity to help someone else grow their business and give back a portion of what God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Business Owner-selling vintage timepieces (watches, clocks, etc.)

lender.name: jacinda
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people in other countries who are trying to help their families and themselves. I feel blessed to have been born in the U.S. I want people to know other people care and want to help. This is a great tool to help people across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales representative for medical and surgical products. I work with physicians to show them how the products work in the operating room.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I think that making a loan to give someone else an opportunity to improve their life is such a small thing for me to do.

lender.name: SHARI
lender.loan_because: It can have such a tremendous impact and it's so easy to do. It feels good to touch the lives of others in such a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I handle financial records for retirement communities that my family owns. I am also busy with four children.

lender.name: PAULO VICTOR
lender.loan_because: I believe in a new development logic, that priorizes wealth generation where it really doesn't exist.

lender.name: Brent & Michelle
lender.loan_because: Because it's a great idea!!!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is having enough money to support a family.
lender.occupational_info: I have come a long way, I work in Emergency Management now and after accomplishing alot being a single mother I want to help.

lender.name: Earl & Nina Pollack
lender.loan_because: As survivors of an F-4 tornado that hit our hometown of Enterprise, AL. on March 01, 2007, We know how important (morally & physically) it feels when friends, family, neighbors and strangers pull together their willingness to share whatever little they have for wanting to help others, therefore, if we share our blessings with others, it makes this world a better place for all mankind.
lender.occupational_info: First of all, (During this hard hit economical time, it's a blessing to have a job. Overall, thank God for everything, and always remember that someone somewhere still need our help.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I would like to play a small part in jump starting the world economy
lender.occupational_info: Help customers solve their computer problems.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I care about the world. I want everyone to have the chance to make their lives and the lives of their family better.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help small businesses start, grow, & succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting & Financial management for small businesses.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward :-)

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: When times were quite hard, someone put new tires on our indespensible family clunker so we could get to work & school. It's wonderful to receive yet a blessing to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent widow living on a pension.

lender.name: Kathy J
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office during the day and do machine embroidery on garments as kj's krafts.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: As a successful hard working,goal oriented individual, I know that when you put your mind to something, it will come true. There are people less fortunate than myself and part of my goals are to help people who want to better themselves through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I have learned to do things for myself. I am a self taught business woman who runs the money in my husbands electrical business.

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: "Bob" says that we should help the humans.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to do something great, even in the smallest of ways, to make someone else's life better. What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I am a housewife and a textile artist. As a textile artist I design artful gifts and also design prints for surfaces like fabric and paper.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small change in the world and help others achieve a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time fiber/mixed media artist. I bead, paint, embroidery and sew on textiles.

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: Operate my own business with my wife

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that may just need the same oportunities that most of us take for granted I want to see underdeveloped countries do well I want the world to be the kind of place where we can all do well I dont want another child to go hungry
lender.occupational_info: I am an Insurance secretary for a small company but more than anything I am just glad to be employed in this stressful economy.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: helping feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student working towards my own business goals.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Encouraging those who are willing to better themselves is the right thing to do. And, Kiva is a way for us to do what God has commanded us to do in helping others, Regardless of whether we know them. Read Mark 12!
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a communications company for 32 years, then as a bank manager for 3 years. I am now the Executive Director of Bristol Faith in Action.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: As a former single mother I know firsthand the struggles involved in raising a child alone. I had help along the way, and now I want to extend my hand to other folks who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I assist farmers with implementing practices on their land that protect water quality and reduce soil erosion, as well as create healthier living conditions for their livestock.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I can help.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate in my life and it feels good to help out when I can, especially knowing what a difference it can make in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell personal security items and sporting goods to wholesale distributors.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: Piet
lender.loan_because: $100 000 I want to establish a professional succesful construction company
lender.occupational_info: Iam a small business man with a dream of owning a Construction Company that build houses off plan and sell them back to public through bank finance.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I can. It's that simple. What's worth more: the dollar of interest that my contribution would have made if it were to sit in my bank account, or lending that money so that it can make a difference in a family's life?
lender.occupational_info: I develop new tools and techniques to help make finding new drugs to treat diseases easier.

lender.name: Marika
lender.loan_because: I want to help other woman who do not have the same opportunities as I have. I can life independently and do not need to stay with a man if I don't want to. I want to give other woman the same opportunity of independency.

lender.name: Mansueto Ventures
lender.occupation: Publisher of Inc. and Fast Company magazines
lender.loan_because:
As a publication, we strive to tell the stories of entrepreneurs -- to give voice to their experiences, their visions, and values.
Entrepreneurs are the lifeblood of economies everywhere and we want to give entrepreneurs outside the U.S. a chance to succeed, so that they too may share their stories with the world.
In our quest to cover the pursuits of entrepreneurship, we will be blogging on our website, Inc.com, as we receive updates and progress reports on the businesses we have lent to.
lender.occupational_info:
Inc. magazine and its online component Inc.com, is the leading resource for entrepreneurs and small business owners.
Inc.com covers breaking news of the small business world and issues that affect entrepreneurs on a daily basis. The site also provides practical information to owners of small and mid-size companies on how to run a better business.

lender.name: Eric T
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Ashley & Brian
lender.loan_because: We think this is a great way to support the personal growth of individuals and their countries!
lender.occupational_info: We study and work all the time! :-)

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be successful and provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I had been in sales for over 25 years, now my new job is a stay at home mom and I love it. I enjoy knitting, bird watching, gardening and gatherings with family and friends. I have always given time to my community, now I feel I am giving somethng beyond.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a frozen yogurt shop.

lender.name: Alex & Bruce
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I wanted to find a way to make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Cordell
lender.loan_because: To many people live hand to mouth simply because they are not able to begin doing something that will help them lift themselves up. I want to help and at the same time see that my contribution has an impact. I do other charitable things but I do this because it is reaches out to people with real needs who are willing to help themselves and it does so in a way that I can participate and watch. There are a lot of organizations that ask for donations and ask you to trust them, with this I can at least see the success or failure myself. I did this for some time a stage name so to speak, but now that I have seen this work I want to use my real name and encourage others to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make decisions about how to best use their money to reach their own goals.

lender.name: Jon and Janeal
lender.loan_because: We want to change lives by extending the tender mercies of a loving Heavenly Father to our brothers and sisters around the world. "When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God"
lender.occupational_info: Much like Kiva borrowers, we create business ventures from a start up stage. Jon also coaches entrepreneurs and business professionals for success.

lender.name: Sylvia & Zoei
lender.loan_because: Having lived in third world countries, I have seen first hand the impact a small amount of money can make to families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families, children and adolescents to improve their mental well being and help them work through life issues that prevent growth. Zoei is my granddaughter.. and my heart.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Shellie
lender.loan_because: We are blessed here in America, we must help those who have less than ourselfs.

lender.name: Robert and Linda
lender.loan_because: This is a way for me to help people who can be successful if they are given an opportunity and some assistance.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I sell healthcare technology solutions.

lender.name: Vandal
lender.loan_because: I have more than most and like to share with those who might scratch my belly and let me lick their face.
lender.occupational_info: I chase Otto a lot and sometimes he chases me. He's my buddy who gives to Kiva also.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world in any way I possibly can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fund raiser for a university. I raise money for scholarships so that students who might not be able to afford an education can go to the university.

lender.name: Mckenzie
lender.loan_because: I got a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas and decided to check it out. Kiva is a great way to make microfinance more personal, and I can't wait to see my money at work improving someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: I am an international affairs and elementary education student at Northeastern University in Boston, MA.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I can personally help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit all sorts of marketing text.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: I manage multiple projects in the Western US to build cellular sites for the wireless carriers

lender.name: Phuong
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that this is one of the best ideas I have encounter. To be a part of this empowerment is very hopeful and uplifting.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: Increasing personal independance and the ability for upward mobility for yourself and family is vital to mental, emotional and physical well being.
lender.occupational_info: Mom, Wife, Project Manager Consultant, Micro-Farmer. Current passion is our growing organic microfarm, breeding rare Chincoteague Ponies and volunteering in my community to promote sustainable small scale agriculture.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women around the world achieve their goal of making a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I design tourism related advertisements.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have had a great opportunity to earn money because I live in Canada. I would like to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell on line through eBay.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful service that provides a way we can all connect and share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a busy glass company. We have many employees and it is a very busy office & store. The best way to describe my work is to say it is like juggling feathers in a hurricane! Luckily my co-workers are wonderful and they all have a fantastic sense of humour so even thought it can be frantic sometimes, there are lots of opportunities for hilarity throughout the day. I love my job.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I'm wealthy enough to share, and from my work, I know you can't take it with you anyway!
lender.occupational_info: I look after people recovering from surgery. And I read. A lot. Hence the picture.

lender.name: Janie - Dallas TX
lender.loan_because: Helping others is part of who I am and I would not have survived some tough times if not for those who helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Raise money to revitalize a river that runs through our city and to create recreational and environmental opportunities near downtown and inner city neighborhoods.

lender.name: DrJ
lender.loan_because: ...from a seed blossoms a sunflower, from a note emerges a symphony...
lender.occupational_info: ...helping people feel better by developing better nutrition...

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I understand the need for capital investment. I feel fortunate to have access to that here in the US.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Consulting

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: While reading a Habitat Homeownership application, I read these words from an applicant: "All I need is a chance." Those simple words stuck with me, and I believe that Kiva gives chances; my hope is that they are given to truly deserving people who thrive because of them. It's all about giving a hand up, not a hand out (also Habitat inspired).
lender.occupational_info: Habitat for Humanity of Suffolk - Family Services

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: This organization is a great idea and I wanted to get involved with it!

lender.name: Michael & Barbara
lender.loan_because: This is a great program

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and interdependent; sharing is good for all of us and the Earth.
lender.occupational_info: ...to create community & understanding. ...to choose love and compassion in each moment.

lender.name: James & Aidan
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping a person pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.occupational_info: artist

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe in random acts of kindness, giving back to help those less fortunate, raising people out of poverty, enriching people's lives. Remember that even a small donation helps someone reach a dream.

lender.name: Susan A
lender.loan_because: I like to help people. I have been fortunate and now that I am retired I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired US Army Sgt. and am cruising the south pacific on my 32' sailboat....alone...except for my parrott "Elmer" who never shuts up

lender.name: Staci
lender.loan_because: I believe in small businesses - they can change the world!
lender.occupational_info: My job helps keep helicopters safe to fly.

lender.name: Pilar
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: it is a great opportunity to make a positive impact.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone on earth should be gainfully employed and , if not, should be given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Now retired, I was a Catholic nun who taught for 20 years, then left the convent and went to Japan as an English professor. I was a music teacher and played organ, piano, viola and flute. I learned the koto and shamisen (musical instruments) in Japan and the Japanese tea ceremony. I speak and have taught Esperanto, the international language.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I want to help and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative support at Google.

lender.name: Homer JH Humanitarians
lender.loan_because: We are a group of students who work to raise money simply to use to help other people in the United States and the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of 8th grade students (ages 13-14) who are learning how a small gesture can do great things.

lender.name: Otto
lender.loan_because: my buddy Vandal does it too.
lender.occupational_info: I protect my family from predators, especially those nasty wild pigs.

lender.name: Mikeska Family
lender.loan_because: We are Blessed to have so many of our needs met. We love the idea of being able to help others change their families future.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: It is such a simple way to have a huge impact on helping others and changing lives around the world!

lender.name: Alan
lender.occupational_info: I educate children aged 14-18 at a private Catholic High School in Tennessee.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ed Lopez
lender.loan_because: Hopefully these loans can help someone else do what I haven't been able to do in my life.....make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Unemployed

lender.name: Carsten & Dorthe
lender.loan_because: Being able to help is a gift in itself

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Lisa & Rob
lender.loan_because: I like the business idea and helping people meet their goals.
lender.occupational_info: We build devices to help people.

lender.name: Gary and Kim
lender.loan_because: Just passing it forward!

lender.name: Lima Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people that don't have the resources or money to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.occupational_info: I manage engineers that design air traffic control radars.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: As a recent college graduate, I know the difference that $25 can make and if I can make a difference with my $25, I feel blessed to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I went to college so that I would be able to both contribute great things to the world and also so that I have might be able to have a better understanding of the world I live in.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: So important for people to get the leg up that they need. How can you deny a person the chance to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: ...i simply must.
lender.occupational_info: i create/write/take photographs of beautiful and meaningful things...nature, people and places.

lender.name: The Afflecks
lender.loan_because: Our family would like to help other families provide for their communities & villages
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals & Companies by providing investment advisory services

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Here in the US, we are fortunate to be educated, obtain loans and open businesses. I want to give that opportunity to others who might be less fortunate. Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I sell fair trade and eco-friendly products from around the world.

lender.name: RALPH
lender.loan_because: I like the personal satisfaction of empowering people rather than handing over something for free. Kiva loans allow them to take what we lend and make something lasting for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: In the business of lending for the American Dream: Buying your own home!

lender.name: Marissa & Curtis
lender.loan_because: We want to share the blessings that God has given us. We share in our church and we to share in the world.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I would like to change the world, and help others with the gifts I have been given. My goal is to fund 1,000 loans.
lender.occupational_info: I own an internet marketing company that focuses on customer service and internet shopping.

lender.name: Nathan and Natasha
lender.loan_because: I have a good life, and I hope this can help someone else in need have a good life too.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Lexus Roadside Assistance accout, and we set up service, and dispatch someone to help owner's of Lexus' vehicles that are broken down.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to help people in other countries with their business adventures.
lender.occupational_info: A small business owner with my husband in concrete construction.

lender.name: William J. McLoughlin
lender.loan_because: I would like to help in the efforts to save the worlds chimpanzees for Dr Jane Goodall at http://janegoodall.org and also must help the worlds people so that there may be more resources to help the chimpanzees.
lender.occupational_info: Green Energy

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have a great respect for entrepreneurs. My Dad, most of my 5 brothers and sisters, and my husband all own their own businesses. Small businesses create jobs and that creates wealth. KIVA is the most common-sense solution to poverty I have ever seen.
lender.occupational_info: I have a college degree in teaching, but I am currently staying at home to raise my children and help my husband do the accounting for his businesses.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: It does make a difference.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with an amazing life. I feel so fortunate to have the things that I do that I'd like to give those less fortunate the same opportunities.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place :)

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be an American woman with exceeding opportunities that women of other countries don't have.

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: these people want so little to get their business started. It's humbling to be part of their sucess factors.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to keep computing information safe.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel better about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory. I do experiments in order to improve our knowlegde about nature and to improve the way people live.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I HAVE A SMOKE SHOP IN PHX AZ I NEED 10,000

lender.name: Dianne and Kuyk
lender.loan_because: Through the kindness and generosity of friends, family and complete strangers, I have enjoyed a life of bounty. It is gratifying to lend a hand to these worthy entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Jasmyne
lender.loan_because: $25 to me isn't much, but to someone else it can be a small miracle.

lender.name: Courtney & Brent
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We work to abolish the stealing of children for sexual exploitation.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: small independent business and micro lending not only "rock"... but empower those who know how to make every dollar count. Do It Yourself...
lender.occupational_info: I own a small "punk" rock record store that provides an outlet for underground music from all around the world... http://www.myspace.com/singlesgoingsteadyseattle

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and I can! This world needs all the help it can get!
lender.occupational_info: In a wheelchair, retired and wanting to help someone thats not as lucky as me!

lender.name: Joan & Blaine Wilson
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a huge difference in the lives of people in the developing world.

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance to make a living.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: My eyes cannot see when I only look at me.

lender.name: Mr. Whitford
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of 22 students living in southeastern Alberta. The gift to Kiva was given to us by our teacher at Christmas in 2007 and renewed in the spring of 2009, then again in September of 2010.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: "In our willingness to give that which we seek, we keep the abundance of the universe circulating in our lives." - Deepak Chopra (Plus, it's just a really cool thing to do!)
lender.occupational_info: In addition to being a Spanish translator for Kiva, I work as Commercial Director for a foundation in Ecuador. We are leaders in Geotourism, conservation, education and micro-enterprise development in the Ecuadorian Amazon and beyond.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to have big dreams. We're all a community, we need to make things happen together!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse, I take care of a man in his home, who has no use of his arms, and has to have a machine breathe for him. It is very fulfilling to help him live a full and nearly normal life. But someday I would like to start a business, so actually you are very inspiring to me.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life!

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I can redisburse it repeatedly to help several people without losing a penny.

lender.name: Dave & Barb
lender.loan_because: Because we can, and we should.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can and I understand the feeling of wanting to be financially stable.
lender.occupational_info: I learn new things on a daily basis and try to understand the world around me.

lender.name: Sal Santos
lender.loan_because: This is so much fun! its like planting a tiny American Dreams in the poorest regions in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take of computer networks and servers for small businesses

lender.name: Meghann & Paul
lender.loan_because: We loan because we hope for a better future for the whole world.

lender.name: 36teen Design Studios
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with talent to create art in which gives me the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Thanks be to God who has given me the talent and inspiration to create art in this moment in time. Because of my art, it has given me the opportunity to help others in Christ name.

lender.name: avery and kait
lender.loan_because: it helps those in need, and a great use of technology.
lender.occupational_info: Design Signs and Graphics. Cut and Style hair

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to create global growth; with the success of one economy follows the success of all economies.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly sit in a classroom, but when I am working for money, I stock shelves at a local store.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people and this is a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help people regain their independence after a debilitating illness through exercise, adaptive equipment (like a specialty built fork-for example), modalities (like hot packs, electrical stimulation) and splinting (like a hand brace). I have worked with the elderly for 16 years. I LOVE my job!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It's amazing to see how a few dollars from my pocket can be shared with an entrepreneur who can in turn use them to make a world of difference in his/her life!!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: St Luke 6 vs 38 Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in the Circle of Giving, I am blessed, when someone support my business, so I have to sow into another person's life to help them in any kind of way.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate to have a very loving family, 3 wonderful kids, a great job, and a house.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps our military be safe when they are in battle for peace on this earth.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Radiology department of a local hospital and work as a photographer part-time.

lender.name: Brian & Judy
lender.loan_because: To help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a food buyer for a large business and Judy is head cook in a high school.

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: there is a need
lender.occupational_info: I WAS IN THR BUSINESS OF SELLING BUILDING MATERIALS - AM NOW RETIRED

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I love people and I strongly believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the vocational rehabilitation field; helping people with disabilities to become productive members of society.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: Women around the world have proven they can achieve so much with so little.
lender.occupational_info: I try to explain politics to young people so they can be involved with the world around them.

lender.name: harvey
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Ash
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Busy with paper and pen.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I love to see others working to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My husband Tom and I raise Scottish Highland Cattle and sell them either live to other breeders or for beef.

lender.name: Chevalier Wedding
lender.loan_because: Of all the organizations we have ever donated to, this one is the only one that gives 100% of the donated funds directly to those in need.

lender.name: Fabricadabra
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the development of textiles and products made from textile over the past 20 years. I have a special love for the natural, handwoven and artisal textiles that are brought to us by cooperatives around the world.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: Behind the scenes, IT, with your pharmacy prescription card. Updating benefits.

lender.name: Martin and Alice
lender.loan_because: If I can spare a little bit to make a difference, why not? When the loan is repayed, I can loan again, keeping the gift alive.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer programs that help scientists and engineers do their work better and faster.

lender.name: JOSE
lender.loan_because: No one lend me a thang thing when I ask, special the big boys of financing Now that I dont need to barrow , I will kindly lend from the bottom of my hart.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to protect the environment when it come to air contaminants. Our department are know by many names such as Tree Huggers, Plumes stuffer, exhaust stack stuffer or California Environmental Protection Agency. Our motto is because you can not see it , it doesnt mean I can not kill you.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want all women to be able to provide for themselves. To create a self worth feeling that will help them achieve even more than they dreamed was ever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from the legislative branch of state government as a public information officer to 138 state legislators.

lender.name: Pattie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. So little can do so much. To help others help themselves is a wonderful. We are blessed and I want others to reap the blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of women that help women change their lives. We give them an earning opportunity. In many cases, they would not be able to gain employment elsewhere.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: "No man is an island, Entire of itself. Each is a piece of the continent, A part of the main. If a clod be washed away by the sea, Europe is the less. As well as if a promontory were. As well as if a manner of thine own Or of thine friend's were. Each man's death diminishes me, For I am involved in mankind. Therefore, send not to know For whom the bell tolls, It tolls for thee." John Donne
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior partner at the Law Firm I work in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Im responsible for developing work methods and computer systems that will improve the work of all the fields at the Firm.

lender.name: Gagahlin
lender.loan_because: One of the reasons is to make a difference in my life. Not just with my words, but with my resources. I cant tell you how great this makes me feel.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Yohanes R. Gagahlin. I'm 32 years old, ...currently I'm a trading consultant and fund manager. My career has found me in many different roles, from going nowhere to business owner. I'm graduate from Computer Science. I like everything tech, mechanical trading, programming and taking nighthly in front of my notebook.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: Same reason I'm a vegetarian and play in a band: Chicks dig it.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: Everyone does better when EVERYONE does better. We are all part of each other.

lender.name: Saint Louis
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anjee
lender.loan_because: This is such a creative and useful way of empowering those who want more for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a potter/gallery owner and a dance teacher.

lender.name: Rob @ Innovative Methods
lender.loan_because:
We are a social marketing and technology firm in the Washington, DC suburbs of Bethesda, MD. Our mission, to improve the human condition through innovative and effective approaches that deliver sustainable results, focuses our services portfolio on 5 fundamental market sectors:
Agriculture Education Health Energy Environment
Aside from just plain giving some good old fashioned help to others, this is an experiment for us to learn about what it's like to support our fellow entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Warm fuzzies!
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses with computers.

lender.name: Laura and Abe
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes.

lender.name: Magnifi Online
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: We help businesses promote their products, services, and websites via search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and MSN.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: the resources I have can be given, shared, and multiplied in a way that benefits both sides of the transaction!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at a university in Virginia. I study Communication Studies and Spanish and hope to go to nursing school after I graduate.

lender.name: Leeanna
lender.loan_because: I just want to help others less fortunate than me. I have been blessed in my lifetime and hope others will feel blessed as well by my small offering of help.
lender.occupational_info: I helped people get loans to buy houses.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I keep my institution running from the ground up.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God to have everything I need in life. I want to help as much as I can to those who are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: TODD
lender.occupational_info: advertising

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like business, especially the financial, strategical, and entrepreneurial aspects. I also believe that revolving, structured lending provides a better incentive and foundation for success in emerging markets.
lender.occupational_info: Analyze real estate for private investment

lender.name: Kim Banks
lender.loan_because: It's a way of giving back that I really enjoy. I love helping hard-working entrepreneurs support their families and achieve their business goals.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people buy and sell homes in Savannah and Tybee Island, Georgia.
Kim Banks Realtor Exclusive Georgia Properties Office: 912-335-5849 Cell: 912-655-3404

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I design print and web communications for my clients -- creatively aiding them in growing their businesses.

lender.name: Andrew and Christine
lender.loan_because: We believe in the concept of "self help".

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Chris H
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's more empowering to those who need it than simply giving money
lender.occupational_info: I am a cognitive neuroscientist. I study the way the brain mechanisms that underlie our behavior.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: Because you must "pay it forward" to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate than me. I want to rid America of its selfish reputation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the way forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student (advanced university student) in English literature. I do research and I teach university students about writing and literature in English.

lender.name: DeBelize
lender.loan_because: I hope this can help someone create a new future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the best brewery in the US, perhaps the world! I work in sales, customer service, tours and I act as an all-around general information source for the brewery and our town!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I come from humble backgrounds and want to help others achieve success just as I have. I have met many hard-working people who just need a lucky break. I hope that these loans make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy travelling, particularly to Central and South American (e.g., El Salvador and Colombia). Notwithstanding the bad press, there are good people in these countries and I want to help.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the chance to earn their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I love to paint and sculpt in many mediums

lender.name: Jo
lender.occupational_info: I prepare tax returns for small companies and individuals. I also prepare financial statements and do some bookkeeping. I am still in college.

lender.name: James and Melissa
lender.loan_because: because everybody deserves a chance.

lender.name: robert
lender.occupation: Department of Homeland Security Federal Officer

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's very exciting to see the entrepreneurial side of the developing world. These people put alot of hard work into running a business and its great to be able to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Economist for the federal government. I help organize how tax dollars are spent.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: i know that i can make a difference, and i like seeing change driven by the passion of a handful of individuals, not huge organizations.

lender.name: Stephen & Myrna
lender.loan_because: We have visited people in Cambodia and recognize that many of the Cambodians we met will use this type of loan wisely.

lender.name: alvarado family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and want to bless someone else.

lender.name: Matthew and Anna
lender.loan_because: We like to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I am a 4th grade student, and I love to ride horses and play with my friends--Anna I am a 7th grader, and play football, lacrosse, and basketball--Matthew

lender.name: mia
lender.occupational_info: I work for Bank of America

lender.name: Sue, Lindsay and Shelby
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to help someone who will use the funds to build a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a working, single mother of 2 teenage girls.

lender.name: Kent and Jean
lender.loan_because: we want to help another family have a better life and achieve its dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Kent teaches college education courses and Jean teaches second grade.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic way to help others, and to give a gift that can really do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I sell software that helps people and companies better communicate.

lender.name: BreAnne
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and have always had what I needed and feel that it is my honor and duty to give back for everything that I have been lucky enough receive, plus the fact that their is no better feeling then making someone elses life just a little bit easier.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student working on a Literature degree to become a teacher. I am also an author and I run a pet rescue dedicated to raising orphan animals.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed in my life by God, that I want to share that blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a farm and have a herd of beef cows. I harvest hay from the farm and sell the calves from the cows. I am also the secretary/bookkeeper for my husband's logging business.

lender.name: Rob & Greg
lender.loan_because: ...we have been blessed with wonderful family and friends, including two special nieces who began their lives outside the US. We believe we have a responsibility to give back beyond our local community.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps people help themselves. These loans also help benefit communites by spreading prosperity though employment opportunites, services and creating small business/banking infrastructure.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: Kiva Rocks! What a terrific idea to help enterprising individuals in developing nations. I LOVE this organization! And plus, their website is very well-designed. Kudos to Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: My picture was taken in in the rainforest in Eastern Madagascar, alongside a black and white ruffed lemur named Zizi.

lender.name: Nick & Jess
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: The Starrs
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Dad owns buildings that he rents to people. Mom is a doctor in a busy emergency room. Both the kids are full time students.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I write news.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important for the citizens of this country to actively spread peace.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph the city of Los Angeles , CA.

lender.name: Jenni & Robert
lender.occupation: Robert is a U.S. Marine and Jenni is a student.
lender.loan_because: We believe in people. Everyone should be able to turn dreams into reality. There was a time in our lives when it was tough to even put food on the table, let alone chase our dreams. If we can help just one person bear that burden, we will be bettering ourselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Robert serves the United States government and protects our country. He works with tanks.
Jenni is a college student studying Environmental Biology.

lender.name: Schuyler
lender.loan_because: i want to help
lender.occupational_info: i am just a kid who wants to help you.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have all that I do in this life and I believe that I have a responsibility to help others whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel students and teach at a local college.

lender.name: Hannah & family
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school and my family supports my dreams to help other people have better lives.

lender.name: maggie
lender.occupational_info: playing with children

lender.name: Sherry & Foster
lender.loan_because: it gives me the opportunity to offer a "hand up." I have traveled to many countries and found people everywhere want the same things we do: food, clothing, security for their families. Many just need a chance to make that happen.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can see that small loans really change lives
lender.occupational_info: I work assisting people with injury and problems relating to exercise (or lack of it) to try and improve their health

lender.name: Reg & Daughters
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give."......Winston Churchill.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver and sell snacks to other small businesses in my immediate area.

lender.name: Alan and Jill
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: I buy products automotive products for a chain of stores in Oregon and Washington

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes in your life. We are put on this Earth to help each other, not just ourselves.

lender.name: The Pennster
lender.loan_because: people and cultures benefit from learned self-sufficiency & successful business practices...not charity/government handouts.
lender.occupational_info: The Mountain Town Dream Co. sells and markets all-natural papers for connoisseurs of MMJ, artists, mountain folk, or anyone else who appreciates both high-quality products and responsible business practices. We strive to do business in an ethical and responsible manner whenever humanly possible. During our first year, we will donate a minimum of 3% of our profits to organizations who support both environmental and social causes...like entrepreneurial loans enabled by Kiva.org

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I file pieces of paper into folders and drawers for lawyers.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe that the highest calling is to be of service to others. I want to share a little of my good fortune. I'm incredibly grateful to have been guided to Kiva. Rock on!
lender.occupational_info: I was a lawyer for a long time and recently retired. Now, as a mortgage broker, I help people find loans to buy a house.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to help!

lender.name: Vic
lender.loan_because: This is the most worthwhile, most empowering, most beautiful idea for helping others I have ever come across in my life.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to think that I can make a good difference in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find books and other materials, check the materials in and out, put returned items back on the shelves, order through Interlibrary Loan.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do.

lender.name: CINDI
lender.loan_because: I know how incredibly blessed I am and being a single Mom of 2 great fortunate kids it is important to make our contributions to this crazy place we live...earth

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: although I haven't much money I feel lucky to have what I do and would like to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work to assist students, mostly

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: Lead QA Analyst - ZeniMax Online Studios
lender.occupational_info: What I don't do is play video games all day long :-)

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all you need is a little help. Plenty of people have helped me and now I can help someone else.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is what the Lord wants me to do, is to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large retail store taking care of the grocery department.
